ResourceHeader.Description: This set of IMP 6 LANL 1-hr solar wind plasma parameter data includes temperature anisotropy and alpha/proton ratio.  This hourly resolution data set was created at NSSDC in the year 2003 by averaging 2-min resolution solar wind data provided over the years by LANL.  Magnetosheath data were excluded from the 2-min data by LANL.  This data set supersedes hourly solar wind data provided by LANL over the years.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge NASA Space Physics Data Facility, National Space Science Data Center and the Principal Investigator for data usage.
